Class WpProtocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • WpProtocol
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class WpProtocol
extends java.lang.Thread
    A class to handle the waypoint protocol. In need of being rewritten.

        Wait for another thread/the drone before the next step.

      • notifyLock

        public void notifyLock(int seq,
                       int mode)
        Called by the receiving server when a message in the waypoint protocol is received.
        Parameters:
        seq - The sequence number in the waypoint protocol
        mode - The mode for the waypoint protocol, read/write/done with read/write

      • startSequence

        private void startSequence()
        Called by the infinite loop when a read or a write is initiated. Prepares the needed messages to be sent.

      • send

        private void send(MessageType messageType,
                  byte[] mavLinkByteArray)
        Sends the message needed to comply with the waypoint protocol.
        Parameters:
        messageType - The type of the medssage to be sent(either Mavlink to the drone or a command to the phone)
        mavLinkByteArray - The Mavlink message byte array if messageType is Mavlink
        See Also:
        MessageType
